Name: N-Type TOPCon Bi-Facial Solar PV Module G2G
Specifications: Technology Type: N-Type TOPCon ; Cell Type: 144 Half-Cut Cells ; Application: Utility & Commercial ; Standard: UL & IEC Standards ; Certification: ALMM & BIS ; Category: N-Type Topcon
Key_Features: Bigger 16BB M10R N-Type TOPCon Solar Cells for Higher Wattage , 144 Half-Cut Cells for better performance in low light , Multi-Busbar Structure for Lower Electrical Losses , Non-Destructive Cell Cutting Process for lower chances of micro-cracks , Round Ribbon Connectors for better utilization of light , 1% Degradation in first year and 0.4% Degradation in subsequent year , Excellent Anti-PID Performance , 3.26% BOS Cost Savings , 1.56% Reduction in LCOE
Full_Description: N -TYPE TOPCon BI-FACIAL SOLAR PV MODULE, 144 HALF-CUT CELLS - G2G
